Title: Libero (Along the Ridge)
Writer: Linda Ferri (screenplay), Linda Ferri (story by), Francesco Giammusso (screenplay), Francesco Giammusso (story by), Kim Rossi Stuart (screenplay), Kim Rossi Stuart (story by), Federico Starnone (screenplay), Federico Starnone (story by)
Actors: Alessandro Morace, Kim Rossi Stuart, Barbora Bobulova, Marta Nobili
Plot: A young father and his two children struggle to find harmony after his wife leaves them for another man.
